news.title: Civic bodies in West Bengal plan property tax re-evaluation
news.para: “The tax structure of the areas under different civic bodies has not been revised for years. We have told the valuation board to visit all municipalities to come up with a real valuation of the property tax structure in tune with the present land price of the areas," said Firhad Hakim.

news.title: About 11 illegal Pilibhit colonies given one month notice before demolition
news.para: These colonies are being developed along national highways 730 and 731, Pilibhit-Madhotanda road and Pilibhit-Bilgawan road adjoining the city municipal area limits.

news.title: Don't approve development plans of amenity plots at JVPD, BMC tells Mhada
news.para: Mhada is now the special planning authority for all Mhada layouts, including JVPD. In 2017, the JVPD Scheme Association had issued a notice to BMC to purchase 12 of the amenity plots.

news.title: Chennai development body cracks whip on building violators
news.para: A special team inspecting 397 buildings that were given approval since May 2021 until Monday found about 16 buildings with violations and deviations and that 112 are yet to begin construction.

news.title: Chandigarh civic body starts property tax grievance redressal centre
news.para: ​​MC commissioner Anindita Mitra said a special counter has been set up at ground floor, MC building, Sector 17.

news.title: Prime minister to unveil first batch of precast PMAY houses in Chennai
news.para: The houses have been built using precast concrete construction technology in a greenfield complex which has 16 towers and each tower has seven floors.

news.title: Chennai: Puravankara Projects breaks environmental laws, fined Rs 5.5 crore
news.para: Puravankara Projects Limited in 2008 had obtained environmental clearance for the construction of a residential apartment complex named Provident Cosmo City at Pudupakkam in Chengalpet with 1,184 units.

news.title: Ancestral bungalow on Bengaluru's Lavelle Road sells for Rs 64,000 per sq ft
news.para: In the other transaction, Prestige Group has resold an 8,321 sqft apartment in Kingfisher Towers, on Vittal Mallya Road, for Rs 35 crore. That puts the going rate at Rs 42,000 per sqft, and indicates a good recovery from Covid-19.

news.title: NGT admits Rs 222 crore EDC plea against South Mumbai building
news.para: In 2018, activist Sureshkumar Dhoka filed the EDC of Rs 222 crore after his earlier petitions to stop illegal extraction of groundwater from these two wells and close them permanently won him favourable orders and action from the authorities.

news.title: Grasim Industries doubles capex to Rs 10,000 crore to set up paints business
news.para: ​In August last year, Grasim Industries' board had approved a Rs 5,000 crore capital expenditure (CAPEX) plan to set up a paints business.

news.title: Govt in final stages to approve property cards for flats registered under MahaRERA
news.para: The scheme will ensure independent property cards for flats (vertical properties) with details of carpet area, amenity space, bank loan information and 7/12 extracts.

news.title: About 190 realtors in Gurugram owe Rs 6,707 crore to government in EDC
news.para: In fact, as many as 190 developers in Gurgaon — including major ones like Supertech, Vatika, Raheja, Vipul and IREO — have defaulted on the payment of Rs 6,707 crore to the state government by way of EDC, a response to an RTI query has revealed.

news.title: Bombay HC tells CCI Projects to deposit 100% interest to be paid to flat buyers
news.para: The HC, however, accepting an undertaking by the builder-CCI Projects Pvt Ltd-and gave it 5 months to deposit over Rs 19 crore before the Tribunal, of which Rs 5.5 crore is to be paid in 4 weeks.

news.title: About 94% women construction workers don't raise voice against air pollution for fear of job loss: Study
news.para: A baseline study was conducted among 390 women construction workers to understand their priorities and issues in their lives, and articulate the impact of air pollution on this group.

news.title: OYO plans IPO after September, may settle for lower valuation
news.para: It is understood that in a letter to Sebi, Oravel Stays Ltd, which runs OYO, has sought permission to include restated financial statements for the six-month periods ending September 30, 2022, September 30, 2021, and September 30, 2020.
